description: Built and maintained full-stack web applications using React, Next.js, and GraphQL, focusing on performance and scalability
Collaborated with clients to gather requirements and deliver tailored, high-quality solutions
Ensured code quality through testing, refactoring, and participation in code reviews
Integrated modern TypeScript practices to improve code maintainability and reduce runtime errors
Taught front-end development fundamentals and advanced concepts to students, covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React
Designed and delivered hands-on lessons and real-world projects to enhance student engagement and understanding
Provided one-on-one mentoring and feedback to support student progress and career readiness
Assisted in developing and updating course materials to reflect current industry best practices
Fostered a collaborative and supportive learning environment, helping students build strong foundations in front-end development
Assisted in developing and maintaining user-facing features using React, Next.js, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Collaborated with senior developers to implement responsive and accessible UI components
Gained hands-on experience with modern front-end workflows, including component-based architecture and version control with Git
Contributed to debugging and performance optimization efforts across multiple projects
Learned and applied best practices in frontend development through real-world tasks and team collaboration
Supported the development of web interfaces using React, TypeScript, JavaScript, and CSS
Collaborated with the development team to build reusable and maintainable UI components
Applied Git for version control and participated in collaborative coding workflows
Gained practical experience in writing clean, type-safe code and working within a modern frontend environment
Assisted in bug fixing and minor feature implementations to improve product quality and usability
